DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , open-label , control ( active comparator ) , randomize study 8 week follow-up evaluation efficacy extend release quetiapine ( quetiapine XR ) versus Sertraline addition previous mood stabilizer treatment ( lithium valproate stable clinically therapeutic blood level ) treatment adult bipolar depression . This multicentric study feature two site Spain .
DOC.brief_title: Quetiapine XR Versus Sertraline Acute Bipolar Depression add-on Therapy
DOC.criteria: Adult ambulatory patient diagnose bipolar disorder I II , current depressive episode ( DSMIVTR 4ª Ed : 296.5x 296.89 code ) Have treat one mood stabilizer ( lithium valproate ) optimal stable dos least previous 4 week randomization Hamilton Depression Rating Scale ( HDRS17 ) total score ≥ 20 Young Mania Rating Scale ( YMRS ) total score ≤ 14 screen randomization visit Informed consent sign Patients axis I II Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th edition , text revision ( DSMIVTR ) diagnose different bipolar disorder I II Length current depressive episode less 2 week 12 month Having treat one mood stabilizer mood stabilizer Lithium valproate , antidepressant , antipsychotic CP4503A inductor/inhibitor within 7 day period prior randomization
